entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -39.0°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.8°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Clear. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
